pages.text: Harness the fury of the heavens. The Sigil of the Storm calls down lightning upon your enemies and can even summon fish from the depths when targeting water.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() 500 per use$(br2)Right-click to call down lightning at the targeted location (up to 64 blocks away).$(br2)$(bold)Special:$() When targeting water, the lightning will yield fishing loot ($(#)2-5 rolls$() by default).$(br2)$(bold)Rain Boost:$() During rain, deals area damage to entities within 5 blocks of the strike point.

pages.title: Configuration
pages.text: The fish loot spawning can be configured:$(li)Minimum rolls: 2 (default)$(li)Maximum rolls: 5 (default)$(li)Set both to 0 to disable$(br2)Loot spawns 1 second after lightning to prevent burning.$(br2)This sigil is perfect for fishing, combat, or simply showing off your mastery of the elements.
